nodes.text: Rogue One Adaptation 2 is the second issue of the canon comic book miniseries Star Wars: Rogue One Adaptation, which adapts the 2016 film of the same name. The issue was written by Jody Houser, illustrated by Emilio Laiso, and published on May 3, 2017 by Marvel Comics.

Jyn Erso continues her quest with Cassian Andor to help the Rebellion fight the sinister Galactic Empire. Following the trail to the ancient Jedha City to find Rebel extremist Saw Guerra [sic], Jyn and Cassian get caught in a firefight with the Empire…only to then be taken prisoner by Saw's followers! The Star Wars story continues!
